channel.title: TaiwanPlus - Latest News
channel.description: Your source of news, culture, and infotainment from Taiwan, a voice of freedom in Asia.

item.title: U.S. and Japanese Delegations Meet With Taiwan's New President
item.description: Delegations from the U.S. and Japan met with President Lai Ching-te after his swearing-in. But while its president may have changed, Taiwanâ€™s international dilemma has not.

item.title: Taiwan's Raucous Legislature: The Laws That Brought Politicians To Come to Blows
item.description: A look at the five laws that have divided Taiwan's legislature to the point of blows.

item.title: Taichung Metro Stabbing Comes Exactly 10 Years After Taipei Attack
item.description: A knife attack on a metro train in Taichung has left two people injured. The assailant is in custody after being subdued by other passengers. The incident occurred ten years to the

item.title: Local Hakka Festival Mixes Legendary Dragon With Industrial Railroad
item.description: A town in Taiwan's northern mountains is the only place still celebrating the Hakka folk legend of the "Cloud Fire Dragon" in an annual festival of the same name, and locals are br
